title: The endless election, Twitter keeps Jack Dorsey as CEO, and a listener question about Pinterest
summary:
Kara and Scott talk about the seemingly endless election and how the platforms have kept false information in check. Also, Twitter's board has decided to keep Jack Dorsey in his position at the company after a months-long review. In listener mail, we get a question about social media and retail and whether Target should acquire Pinterest.
